Let's kick it old-school, with the absolute CLASSIC typewriter effect. I couldn't find a decent jQuery version of this effect that worked, so I pluginified some vintage javascript, checkout the JSFiddle embeded below. Click the play button to see the effect.

One little "bug" here is that I'm not handling any dom elements, so the raw html code is displayed while it's writing, but as soon as it's written the dom handles it as elements, you could pre-parse the html and write the elements wholesale but that's far beyond the scope of this simple solution.

If you wanna see the whole shebang check the jsfiddle at http://jsfiddle.net/JKirchartz/JEpWV/
